text:
AT&T | Palo Alto, CA | Onsite | Full-time

My team at AT&T's Chief Data Office is hiring a couple of Software Engineers/Data Engineers. They will be responsible for data wrangling and working with data scientists to take machine learning prototypes to production.

Keywords: Hadoop, SQL/Hive, Scala, Java, Spark, MapReduce, Python

https://www.att.jobs/job/palo-alto/big-data-software-enginee... https://www.att.jobs/job/palo-alto/big-data-software-enginee...
